document.heading: City of El Paso Health Authority Orders for for Workplaces in El Paso City-county
City of El Paso Health Authority Orders for for Workplaces in El Paso City-county, March 17, 2020

meta.search-text: THE CO TEXAS Department of Public Health MAYOR Dee Margo CITY OF EL PASO HEALTH AUTHORITY ORDERS FOR WORKPLACES IN EL PASO CITY- COUNTY March 17, 2020 CITY COUNCIL EFFECTIVE IMMEDIATELY District 1 In lieu of presence of COVID-19 in El Paso County, the Health Authority for the El Peter Svarzbein Paso City-County is issuing the following Health Authority Orders for Workplaces. District 2 These approaches are used to minimize morbidity and mortality caused by COVID-19 Alexsandra Annello and to minimize social and economic impacts of COVID-19. District 3 Cassandra Hernandez . Postpone non-essential work travel Encourage staff to telework if equipped to do so District 4 Dr. Sam Morgan Expand sick leave policies: Implement extended telework arrangements (when feasible) District 5 Ensure flexible leave policies for staff who need to stay home due to Isabel Salcido school/childcare dismissals and to encourage individuals to stay home if they District 6 are sick Claudia L. Rodriguez . Implement social distancing measures, e.g.: District 7 Space workers at the worksite by 6 Ft. distance from each other Henry Rivera o Stagger work schedules District 8 O Decrease social contacts in the workplace (limit in-person Cissy Lizarraga meetings) O All break areas must accommodate distancing with regular disinfection of all eating surfaces CITY MANAGER Tommy Gonzalez o Eliminate large work-related gatherings (e.g., staff meetings, after-work functions larger than 10 persons) o Cancel work-sponsored conferences, tradeshows, etc . Conduct regular health checks upon arrival each day (e.g., temperature and respiratory symptom screening) of staff and visitors entering buildings Workers with travel from High-risk area (as established by CDC) facilitate work from home or using virtual means and monitor symptoms for 14 days Hector I.
